text:
@SenSchumer @GeminijlwWilson Exactly!  AND we were just told at the hospital today that the antibody test isn't specific to any one #coronavirus. It just tells if you've had one that's in the coronavirus family. ???

Talk about confusion.  So are you immune or not?

#Covid_19 
#confused 
#FBR
